<rule id="quarkus-hibernate-reactive-00000" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>

                <project>
                    <artifact artifactId="hibernate-reactive-core" groupId="org.hibernate.reactive"/>
                </project>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <iteration over="default">
                    <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="1" title="Replace the 'hibernate-reactive-core' dependency with Quarkus 'quarkus-hibernate-reactive' extension">
                        <message>
                            Replace the `org.hibernate.reactive:hibernate-reactive-core` dependency with the Quarkus dependency `io.quarkus:quarkus-hibernate-reactive`  
                            Further information in the link below.
                        </message>
                        <link href="https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus-quickstarts/tree/master/hibernate-reactive-quickstart" title="Quarkus - Quickstart"/>
                    </hint>
                </iteration>
            </perform>
        </rule>
